name: Become Ukrainian
description:
Ukraїnian people are brave and strong. We receive so much help and support from one another. So everyone now has to become Ukraїnian for a while and unite in order to win (and we need to do it fast, before inevitable ecological disasters hit us all hard and bad). 

Help our worriors by purchasing our tokens - all the money made will go to buy body armor for those standing for the international community against Russian aggression


This art work is made by Marina Samohina, Ukrainian artist from eastern Ukraine that has been occupied by the Russians for 8 years now. Now when attack of Russian troops is spreading all over Ukraine Marina agreed to join Volya and donate money raised to buy body armour for Ukrainian soldiers.
